GRADE_2_CODE: is.na(ANRLO) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) < signif(ANRLO, signif_dig) ~ "2"

Grade_1: 3.0 g/dL to < LLN 30 g/L to < LLN
GRADE_1_CODE: is.na(ANRLO) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) < signif(ANRLO, signif_dig) ~ "1"

GRADE_2_CODE: is.na(ANRHI) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) > signif(ANRHI, signif_dig) ~ "2"

GRADE_1_CODE: is.na(ANRLO) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) < signif(ANRLO, signif_dig) ~ "1"

Grade_3: > ULN with other signs and symptoms of hepatotoxicity
Grade_4: > ULN with lifethreatening consequences (e.g., signs and symptoms of liver failure)
FILTER: compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) > 28 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
COMMENT: Assume worst case of "lifethreatening consequences (e.g., signs and symptoms of liver failure)"

FILTER: compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) <= 28 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
GRADE_1_CODE: is.na(ANRHI) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) >= signif(ANRHI, signif_dig) ~ "1"

FILTER: compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) > 28 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) <= 28 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) >= 7 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) < 7 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)

Grade_1: > ULN to < 6.0 mg/dL; > ULN to < 1.5 mmol/L
GRADE_1_CODE: is.na(ANRHI) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) > signif(ANRHI, signif_dig) ~ "1"

FILTER: compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) >= 7 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) < 7 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)

Grade_1: < LLN to 4.0 mg/dL; < LLN to 1.0 mmol/L
GRADE_1_CODE: is.na(ANRLO) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) < signif(ANRLO, signif_dig) ~ "1"

Grade_2: > 1.3 to 1.8 x ULN OR Increase to 1.3 to < 1.5 x participant’s baseline
Grade_3: > 1.8 to < 3.5 x ULN OR Increase to 1.5 to < 2.0 x participant’s baseline
Grade_4: >= 3.5 x ULN OR Increase of >= 2.0 x participant’s baseline
GRADE_4_CODE: !is.na(ANRHI) & signif(AVAL, signif_dig) >=  signif(3.5*ANRHI, signif_dig) ~ "4",  !is.na(BASE) & signif(AVAL, signif_dig) >=  signif(2*BASE, signif_dig) ~ "4"
GRADE_3_CODE: !is.na(ANRHI) & signif(AVAL, signif_dig) >  signif(1.8*ANRHI, signif_dig) ~ "3",  !is.na(BASE) & signif(AVAL, signif_dig) >= signif(1.5*BASE, signif_dig) ~ "3"
GRADE_2_CODE: !is.na(ANRHI) & signif(AVAL, signif_dig) > signif(1.3*ANRHI, signif_dig) ~ "2",  !is.na(BASE) & signif(AVAL, signif_dig) >= signif(1.3*BASE, signif_dig) ~ "2"
GRADE_1_CODE: is.na(ANRHI) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) >= signif(1.1*ANRHI, signif_dig) ~ "1"

FILTER: compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "months", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") >= 1 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "months", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") < 1 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)

Grade_1: ULN to < 2.0 x ULN without acidosis
Grade_3:
Increased lactate with
pH < 7.3 without lifethreatening
consequences
Grade_4: Increased lactate with pH < 7.3 with lifethreatening consequences

FILTER: compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") >= 18 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") < 18 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") >= 18 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)

(compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") > 2 & compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") < 18)  | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") <= 2  | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
COMMENT: No criteria given for this age range

Grade_1: 2.0 mg/dL to < LLN; 0.65 mmol/L to < LLN
FILTER: compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") > 14 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
GRADE_1_CODE: is.na(ANRLO) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) < signif(ANRLO, signif_dig) ~ "1"

FILTER: (compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") >= 1 & compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") < 14) | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") < 1 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") > 5 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") <= 5 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
COMMENT: No criteria given for this age range

FILTER: compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") > 5 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") <= 5 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
COMMENT: No criteria given for this age range

FILTER: compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) > 7 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)

(compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) >= 2 & compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) <= 7) | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) <= 1 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)

Grade_3: 50 to < 75 mg/dL, 0.50 to < 0.75 g/L OR 0.25 to < 0.50 x LLN
Grade_4: < 50 mg/dL, < 0.50 g/L OR < 0.25 x LLN OR Associated with gross bleeding
GRADE_4_CODE: signif(AVAL, signif_dig) <  0.5 ~ "4",  is.na(ANRLO) ~ NA_character_,  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) <  signif(0.25*ANRLO, signif_dig) ~ "4"
GRADE_3_CODE: signif(AVAL, signif_dig) < 0.75 ~ "3",  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) <  signif(0.5*ANRLO, signif_dig) ~ "3"
GRADE_2_CODE: signif(AVAL, signif_dig) <  1 ~ "2",  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) <  signif(0.75*ANRLO, signif_dig) ~ "2"
GRADE_1_CODE: signif(AVAL, signif_dig) <  2 ~ "1",  signif(AVAL, signif_dig) <  signif(ANRLO, signif_dig) ~ "1"

FILTER: (SEX == "M" | is.na(SEX)) & (compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") >= 13 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT))
(SEX == "F" | is.na(SEX)) & (compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") >= 13 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT))

SUBGROUP: 57 days of age to < 13 years of age (male and female)
FILTER: (compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "years", add_one = FALSE, type = "interval") < 13 & compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) >= 57) | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)

SUBGROUP: 36 to 56 days of age (male and female)
FILTER: (compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) <= 56 & compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) >= 36) | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)

SUBGROUP: 22 to 35 days of age (male and female)
FILTER: (compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) <= 35 & compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) >= 22) | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)

SUBGROUP: 8 to  21 days of age (male and female)
FILTER: (compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) <= 21 & compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) >= 8) | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) <= 7 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) > 7 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
compute_duration(start_date = BRTHDT, end_date = LBDT, trunc_out = TRUE, out_unit = "days", add_one = FALSE) <= 7 | is.na(BRTHDT) | is.na(LBDT)
